text: Monastery of Saint John may refer to: *Monastery of Saint John the Theologian, Patmos *Monastery of St. John in the Wilderness, Jerusalem *Patriarchal Stavropegic Monastery of St. John the Baptist, Essex *Monastery of St John the Studite, Constantinople *Monastery of St John, Pontefract, Yorkshire *Monastery of St. John Theristis, Italy *Saint John Bigorski Monastery, North Macedonia
title: Monastery of Saint John
